title: The Adventures of Ling Green: Consulting Hero
summary: Over the course of one week, Ling Green discovers her unique superpowers amidst her everyday consulting job, battles injustice, and ultimately saves her city.
summaryGerman: Im Laufe einer Woche entdeckt Ling Green ihre einzigartigen Superkräfte inmitten ihres alltäglichen Beratungsberufes, bekämpft Ungerechtigkeit und rettet letztendlich ihre Stadt.
summaryDutch: In de loop van een week ontdekt Ling Green haar unieke superkrachten te midden van haar dagelijkse advieswerk, bestrijdt onrecht en redt uiteindelijk haar stad.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Ling Green découvre ses superpouvoirs uniques au milieu de son emploi quotidien de consultante, combat l'injustice et finit par sauver sa ville.

story.text: Ling Green, a 45-year-old consultant, starts her week feeling energetic after discovering she can communicate telepathically during a routine client meeting.
Intrigued by her new power, Ling uses it to unearth hidden corruption at a major corporation she is consulting for. She feels a mix of triumph and unease.
Ling spends the day strategizing how to use her powers for good. She feels peaceful as she formulates a plan to expose the corrupt executives without causing alarm.
Using her telepathy, Ling discreetly gathers more evidence. The situation takes an eerie turn as she senses a dangerous secret that could impact the whole city.
Ling decides to go public. She orchestrates a clever reveal of the corruption to the media, feeling utterly triumphant as the news breaks nationwide.
In the aftermath, Ling is celebrated as a hero. She realizes her life's passion merges her consulting acumen with her superpower, creating a unique role in society.
Reflecting on her extraordinary week, Ling feels an epic sense of destiny. She pledges to use her powers to champion fairness and truth, wherever her consulting takes her.

ending: Thus, every consulting problem henceforth had a secret weapon: Ling Green, the Consulting Hero.
moral: Your greatest power lies in using your unique skills to make the world a better place.
